context: Global insurance company (500+ employees) evaluating advanced climate risk modeling platform investment to improve catastrophic event prediction and pricing accuracy across multiple geographic markets

request.purpose: Climate risk modeling platform and data integration
request.justification: Increasing frequency of extreme weather events requiring enhanced predictive capabilities for competitive pricing and risk management

decision_process.outcome: Business case approved for board review
Technical feasibility confirmed with minor integration requirements

business_impact.expected_outcome: 15-20% improvement in catastrophic event prediction accuracy
business_impact.projected_value: $8.2M annual value through improved pricing and reduced claims volatility
business_impact.roi_timeline: Expected payback in 18 months with full value realization in 36 months

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: Phase 1 completed on schedule with 98% data integration accuracy achieved
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: Full platform operational with 18% prediction accuracy improvement exceeding target

lessons_learned: Early stakeholder engagement and phased implementation approach critical for complex data platform deployments. Regulatory pre-approval significantly accelerated go-live timeline.
